name: Game Of The Year
description:
This accursed product was birthed on the cusp of this new year. It's presence has banished us to our horrid state this year. Our only hope for redemption is for someone else to bear this burden.

In all seriousness, me and my friend, early game developers,  made this game in about an hour on the last day of 2019, only releasing it now.

In all seriousness X2, the second download is a single PNG of the Gorilla enemy, and is not worth 20 dollars
